Darth Plagueis Wikipedia Darth Plagueis From Wikipedia free encyclopedia Jump navigation Jump search Darth Plagueis Star Wars character Cover Star Wars Darth Plagueis First appearance Film Revenge Sith Literature Star Wars Darth Plagueis Created by George Lucas Information Species Muun Gender Male Occupation Sith Lord Affiliation Sith Darth Plagueis fictional character in Star Wars franchise In story he legendary Sith lord with power over death Star Wars Legends works establish him as master Palpatine becomes Emperor Darth Sidious Contents Appearances Revenge Sith Star Wars Legends Reception References External links Appearances edit Revenge Sith edit Darth Plagueis first mentioned in Star Wars prequel film Revenge Sith during opera scene Darth Sidious under his alternate persona Chancellor Sheev Palpatine tells Anakin Skywalker about tragedy Darth Plagueis Wise Palpatine explains that Plagueis could prevent people from dying create life through special Sith power Force unknown Jedi Despite being able prevent others from dying Plagueis killed in his sleep by his own apprentice Later in film Palpatine as Sidious tempts Anakin dark side by promising use this power prevent Anakin s pregnant wife Padm Amidala from dying as Anakin has foreseen Star Wars Legends edit Star Wars Darth Plagueis Author James Luceno Country United States Language English Series Star Wars Legends Genre Science fiction Publisher Del Rey Publication date January Pages ISBN X Followed by Star Wars Maul Lockdown character featured in Star Wars Darth Plagueis Star Wars Legends novel written by James Luceno released on January novel covers later life machinations Sith lord Darth Plagueis over roughly fifty year period pre dating Phantom Menace novel details Plagueis overthrow his own master Darth Tenebrous his work as head powerful banking consortium on Muun homeworld his discovery recruitment training teenaged Palpatine Naboo efforts Plagueis undermine Galactic Republic ensure dominance dark side Force Daryl Thomen Newsday called Darth Plagueis best Star Wars publication date Reception edit Despite never appearing on screen Darth Plagueis has remained popular Star Wars character quote in which Darth Plagueis mentioned in Revenge Sith has become popular internet meme Some fan theories have suggested that Darth Sidious Palpatine Darth Plagueis in disguise One theory regarding origins identity sequel trilogy s Supreme Leader Snoke that he Darth Plagueis References edit Legend Darth Plagueis Star Wars Episode III Revenge Sith StarWars com Retrieved June
